input: The quorum for Joint Sitting of the Indian Parliament is

options.A: One- twelveth of the total number of members of the House
options.B: One-sixth of the total numbers of members of the House
options.C: One-tenth of the total number of members of the House
options.D: Two-third of the total number of members of the House

explanation: The quorum to constitute a joint sitting shall be one-tenth of the total number of members of the Houses.
